attributes.action: Tougher penalties for Fly-tippers and those refusing to clear them up.
attributes.additional_details: It will help to protect the environment and put people off the idea of Fly-tipping. To ensure Councils do not relinquish responsibility for land owned by them.
attributes.background: Introduce higher penalties for those convicted of Fly-tipping, and financially penalise Councils that refuse to remove Fly-tips on public land.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
